Schedule .tg {border-collapse:collapse;border-color:#9ABAD9;border-spacing:0;} .tg td{background-color:#EBF5FF;border-color:#9ABAD9;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;color:#444; font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;overflow:hidden;padding:15px 12px;word-break:normal;} .tg th{background-color:#409cff;border-color:#9ABAD9;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;color:#fff; font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;overflow:hidden;padding:15px 12px;word-break:normal;} .tg .tg-c3ow{border-color:inherit;text-align:center;vertical-align:top} .tg .tg-svo0{background-color:#D2E4FC;border-color:inherit;text-align:center;vertical-align:top} Week Date/Time Location Notes Project Resources Week 1 Wed 3/17 20:00-22:00 IAMET 406-1 1. 前言 2. 开发环境搭建 3. Web 基础 Project 1: Tetris in JS Fri 3/19 20:00-22:00 IAMET 406-1 1. 天下前端一大抄 2. Bootstrap 和 CSS 3. GOP-面向谷歌编程 Week 2 TBA TBA 1. Git 的使用 2. Debugging 3. 公布你的网页 TBA TBA Week 3 TBA TBA 1. 前端框架 2. Uni-app TBA TBA 1. MVC 设计模式 2. 客户端-服务器通讯 后续内容陆续展示
